description: This file defines the NoteRequest class, a data transfer object (DTO) used for creating or updating notes. It includes fields for title and content with validation constraints and schema annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: NoteRequest
classes.description: A DTO for note creation or update requests, including validation and schema annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note and returns the current instance for method chaining.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note and returns the current instance for method chaining.
